title: Unranked players
body: I think there needs to be a separate division sorta thing for players doing the placement games. For example, all players with similar win rates that are doing their placements get put into a pool with each other. This is so u don't get unranked players that don't have a clue what they are doing and then you lose the game because of them :/

replies.body:
> This is so u don't get unranked players that don't have a clue what they are doing and then you lose the game because of them

Instead, you'll just get ranked players that don't have a clue what they're doing.

+1 How do you expect people to learn with nobody to learn from...
EDIT: You get put with people with similar MMR anyway, if you're getting put with unranked people it kinda means you belong there.
I'll actually agree with this. Did a ranked game yesterday for the first and probably last time. I was so bad, I felt so bad for those people on my team.
